scripts.deploy: pulp build -o lambda/custom/output && ask deploy --target lambda
scripts.build-model: pulp build -o lambda/custom/output && node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' model | jq -S '.' > models/en-US.json
scripts.deploy-model: pulp build -o lambda/custom/output && node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' model | jq -S '.' > models/en-US.json && ask deploy --target model
scripts.build-skill: pulp build -o lambda/custom/output && node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' manifest | jq -S '.' > skill.json
scripts.deploy-skill: pulp build -o lambda/custom/output && node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' manifest | jq -S '.' > skill.json && ask deploy --target skill
scripts.build-all: pulp build -o lambda/custom/output && node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' manifest | jq -S '.' > skill.json &&  node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' model | jq -S '.' > models/en-US.json
scripts.deploy-all: pulp build -o lambda/custom/output && node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' manifest | jq -S '.' > skill.json &&  node -e 'require("./lambda/custom/output/Main").main()' model | jq -S '.' > models/en-US.json && ask deploy
